name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior .NET Engineer with 13+ years in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **ASP.NET**, **T-SQL**, and **SQL Server**, with extensive experience in developing web services and integrating with various systems including **Salesforce**, **SAP**, and **Oracle**.
Skilled in technical problem solving, unit testing, and ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Demonstrated ability in utilizing **JavaScript** and **HTML** for frontend development while effectively managing backend services. Strong communication skills facilitate collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver robust solutions. Experienced in deploying and maintaining applications that enhance operational efficiency.

• Implemented secure Single Sign-On (SSO) and SAML authentication frameworks to enhance user identity management for applications in complex enterprise environments.
• Engaged in technical problem solving and architected solutions utilizing **Microsoft SQL Server** for improved data storage and retrieval, handling queries for up to **10 million records** efficiently.
• Designed and integrated efficient data synchronization between systems like **Salesforce**, **PeopleSoft**, and **SAP** using **XML** and EAI principles to streamline operations.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric applications with **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and CSS, enhancing user experience while adhering to modern web standards.
• Conducted unit testing and drive quality assurance practices using **Postman** and other testing tools to ensure code robustness and security compliance.
• Utilized **Oracle** and **Siebel** for customer management solutions, contributing to a **30%** improvement in client satisfaction metrics through timely support and updates.
• Engaged in effective communication between engineers and stakeholders to ensure project alignment and clarity in requirements and deliverables.
• Streamlined development processes and improved deployment practices through integration of DevOps methodologies with successful use of tools like GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps.

Utilized **C#** and **ASP.Net** to modernize core financial platforms, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and improving performance metrics significantly.
Engaged in technical problem solving by implementing **Web services** for smooth communication between internal applications and third-party platforms like **Salesforce** and **PeopleSoft**.
Developed and maintained SQL queries using **T-SQL** for **SQL Server** databases, achieving a **20%** increase in data retrieval efficiency and optimizing reporting processes.
Designed and implemented Single Sign-On (SSO) and SAML protocols to enhance security measures, resulting in a **30%** decrease in authentication-related support tickets.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve technical challenges efficiently, enhancing overall project delivery timelines by **15%** through improved communication strategies.
Conducted unit testing and debugging to ensure robust code quality across multiple platforms, leading to a **25%** reduction in post-deployment issues.
Engaged with enterprise application integration (EAI) efforts to ensure smooth workflow across systems such as **SAP**, **Oracle**, and **Siebel**, fostering an ecosystem of interconnectivity.

• Developed and optimized **ASP.NET** applications, focusing on business logic and backend services performance for robust e-commerce solutions, ensuring smooth functionality in high-traffic environments with **SQL Server** integration.
• Implemented secure **web services** using **C#** and **JavaScript**, enhancing application interoperability and enabling seamless communication between various software components and third-party tools.
• Leveraged expertise in **unit testing**, delivering high-quality, bug-free code, improving overall system reliability by **30%** through effective test-driven development practices.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy features via **SSO** and **SAML**, ensuring secure, streamlined user authentication and authorization mechanisms.
• Engineered data access and manipulation processes with **T-SQL**, facilitating efficient data retrieval and manipulation, optimizing performance for complex queries by **25%**.
• Utilized **EAI** strategies for connecting legacy systems like **Salesforce** and **SAP** with modern applications, enhancing data flow and integration efficiency across platforms.
• Solved technical problems and collaborated closely with stakeholders to communicate developments, addressing issues proactively and enhancing user satisfaction ratings by **15%**.
• Designed interfaces using **HTML** and **CSS**, adhering to best practices to create clean, user-friendly experiences, compliant with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
• Continuously improved system performance using strategic redesigns for core modules, resulting in a **10%** increase in page load speeds and system responsiveness.
• Developed secure solutions using industry standards, showcasing commitment to data protection and regulatory compliance in all project phases.
